sentences.en: ...a change which would maintain his party's dominant position in Scotland.
sentences.cn: …巩固他的政党在苏格兰支配地位的一场变革。

sentences.en: Because it is carried by a dominant gene, an affected individual can expect about half of his or her children to inherit the illness.
sentences.cn: 因为它是由显性基因携带，所以感染者的孩子会有约50％的可能性遗传该疾病。

sentences.en: Blue eyes are recessive and brown eyes are dominant.
sentences.cn: 蓝眼睛是隐性的;而褐色眼睛是显性的.

sentences.en: In fact this is the dominant meaning in contemporary English.
sentences.cn: 而事实上这却是当代英语中使用得最多的含义.

sentences.en: In marketing, electricity is the dominant form of energy used.
sentences.cn: 电力是销售过程中所用能量的一种主要形式.

sentences.en: its dominant position within the group
sentences.cn: 它在该组织中的突出地位

sentences.en: Japan became dominant in the mass market during the 1980s.
sentences.cn: 20世纪80年代日本在大众市场上开始占据优势。

sentences.en: Melancholy was the dominant note of his temperament, he thought.
sentences.cn: 他思忖:自己的气质中主要的特征是抑郁.

sentences.en: Paris has played a dominant role in France, not just in political terms but also in economic power.
sentences.cn: 不仅仅在政治方面，而且在经济实力上巴黎在法国也都一直处于支配地位。

sentences.en: She was a dominant figure in the French film industry.
sentences.cn: 她在法国电影界是个举足轻重的人物。

sentences.en: That peak is dominant over all other hills.
The company can't preserve its dominant position in the market.
sentences.cn: 该公司在市场上不能让自己保持优势地位。

sentences.en: The dominant components of the healing process are epithelization.
sentences.cn: 愈合过程的主要组成部分,是上皮形成.

sentences.en: The dominant genius of the " Franks " was feudal, military and romantic.
sentences.cn: “ 法兰克人 ”,突出的天才具有封建 、 好斗和浪漫的色彩.

sentences.en: The dominant male gorilla is the largest in the group.
sentences.cn: 领头的公猩猩是这群大猩猩中体形最大的一个。

sentences.en: The firm has achieved a dominant position in the world market.
sentences.cn: 这家公司在国际市场上占有举足轻重的地位。

sentences.en: The joint venture is integrated into the dominant parent's management system.
sentences.cn: 合资企业的管理业务全部纳入母公司的管理系统.

sentences.en: The monoterpenoids are dominant components in the " volatile oils " of plant species.
sentences.cn: 单萜类化合物是植物挥发油的主要成份.

sentences.en: This disorder is inherited as an autosomal dominant trait.
sentences.cn: 本病作为常染色体显性传递.

words.tran_cn: 占主导地位的；强势的；占统治地位的；[数] 受控的
控制，支配；处于支配地位（dominate的过去式）
控制；支配；占优势；在…中占主要地位

phrases.tran_cn: 优势遗传性质，主宰形质；显性性状
主流文化；主文化；主导文化
主要模型；振荡基型；波基型；振荡
[光学]主波长；支配彩色的波长

trans.tran_cn: 占支配地位的，显著的，（基因）显性的
trans.tran_en: more powerful, important, or noticeable than other people or things
